1248880.name: Femida - Party Dues Supporter Pack
1248880.description:
Your money will go to party leadership's pockets...em...we mean...it will benefit the people!

This supporter pack is a collection of special bonus content for the cool people who wish to help us. As it right now we can't develop videogames full-time. Roman Loznevoy is the only full-time worker in the studio, but even he relies on the income outside of Femida. By contributing you will enable us to bring more games to life.

The package includes:

  • 2k to 8k backgrounds & pics from the game that you can use as wallpapers or whatever you do with the pictures of attractive people and overly sexualized statues.
  • Selection of old Femida builds. They're bad but some of them are funny. See how our vision evolved and how the criminal cases of Femida changed over time. Windows only!
  • Rotary phone mechanic unity project

Important note: By buying this DLC you are first and foremost showing your support for the game and us, the developers. That's a lot of money for what in the DLC. The old builds are buggy and you might have difficulties with the unity project because it's an old solution. After purchasing the DLC you can do whatever you want with the content of DLC as long as you credit Femida the videogame. A resale of the content is not allowed.
1248880.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
